verses.name: Acts 3:6
verses.text: Then Peter said, Silver and gold have I none; but such as I have give I thee: In the name of Jesus Christ of Nazareth rise up and walk.

verses.name: Acts 3:7
verses.text: And he took him by the right hand, and lifted him up: and immediately his feet and ankle bones received strength.

verses.name: Acts 3:8
verses.text: And he leaping up stood, and walked, and entered with them into the temple, walking, and leaping, and praising God.

verses.name: Acts 3:9
verses.text: And all the people saw him walking and praising God:
